backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, onboarding, invite codes, user profiles, notifications, vehicle management, and storage features.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, and PWA setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme variables and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, categories, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic caching, fetch handling, and cache version management for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React routing setup with authentication gating and route definitions for all app pages including admin and About.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when users lack permissions, providing a dashboard link and admin setup guidance.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Displays the signâ€‘in screen using Internet Identity with branding and security feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the application logo in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with layout, showing header and footer based on authentication and onboarding state.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for submitting a report marking a vehicle as lost with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for reporting a found vehicle, submitting finder details via mutation.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with logo, navigation links, notifications, user menu, and admin access checks.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Handles initiating a vehicle transfer requiring PIN verification and showing the generated transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: PIN entry dialog used to verify sensitive actions with error handling and submission flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: React Query hooks for admin actions like checking admin status, fetching system stats, invite codes, and registered vehicles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Hooks for retrieving lost vehicles and marking vehicles as lost or found with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hooks to fetch user notifications with polling and mark notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Mutation hook to complete user onboarding and refresh the user profile cache.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Hooks to set up or update a user's PIN via actor mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks to load and pseudo-save the caller's user profile, mainly triggering onboarding flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Hooks for initiating and accepting vehicle transfers with related cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Hooks for user vehicle retrieval, single vehicle lookup, and registering a new vehicle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration with custom theme variables and dark mode values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: UI page describing the app, its features, and admin contact info with navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Form page allowing users to enter a transfer code and accept vehicle ownership, with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system stats and links to manage invite tokens and view all vehicles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin interface to generate, view, and manage invite tokens, including copying invite links and viewing usage status.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing counts of user vehicles, lost vehicles, and notifications, plus quick actions and admin-aware system info.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of reported lost vehicles with details and status tags, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications with timestamps and allows marking them as read, handling loading and empty states.
Onboarding form where new users submit an invite token and profile details to complete account setup.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page showing Internet Identity principal details with a notice that profile updates require admin assistance.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Form page for registering a new vehicle with photo upload, field inputs, and submission to the registerVehicle mutation.
Page for creating or updating a security PIN with validation and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a vehicle, including status, photo, and owner actions like transfers or lost reporting.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists all vehicles owned by the user with status badges and navigation to details or registration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON project state describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, required images, and implemented features.
